entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Melita
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:44 p.m. CDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. Snow beginning after midnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow early in the evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
